IFF, Khoj Studios & Tactical Tech are thrilled to announce that "The Glass Room: Misinformation Edition" is \*finally\* coming to Delhi‚ú®

Join us for the launch of the 10-day exhibition on July 20, 2023, at Khoj Studio, Khirkee Extension, New Delhi.

The Glass Room is for you if you‚Äôve ever thought:  
‚ùìDid the Pope really wear that oversized white puffer?

The Glass Room is an award-winning exhibition by Tactical Tech that has been featured by top-tier media houses & hosted in 61 countries üåèIt is designed to prompt reflection on how misinformation spreads in the digital age & impacts our culture, politics, & society. 

For a fascinating journey through how the gatekeepers of technology influence our behaviour and opinions, join us for the launch on July 20 at Khoj or visit the self-learning installation anytime from July 20-30, 2023!
